Arizona Winter School 2017: Perfectoid Spaces

AWS 2017 will be held March 11-15, 2017 at the University of Arizona in Tucson, AZ.

  • The deadline to apply for funding was November 11, 2016. The deadline to register was December 9, 2016.
  • Schedule and other important information
  • Local directions
  • Organizers: Bryden Cais and Kiran Kedlaya (main program), with Alina Bucur, Mirela Ciperiani, Romyar Sharifi, and David Zureick-Brown
  • Funded by the National Science Foundation and organized in partnership with the Clay Mathematics Institute.
